original_text: And the elders of his house stood beside him, to raise him from the ground, but he would not, nor did he eat food with them.
korean_text: 그 집의 늙은 자들이 그 곁에 서서 다윗을 땅에서 일으키려 하되 왕이 듣지 아니하고 그들과 더불어 먹지도 아니하더라

sentences.original_text: And the elders of his house stood beside him,
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 집 장로들이 그의 곁에 서서,

sentences.original_text: to raise him from the ground,
nor did he eat food with them.
